title: Talbros Automotive's JV firm secures order worth Rs 1,000 cr
description: Talbros Automotive Components announced securing a significant multi-year contract worth approximately Rs 1,000 crore from a European OEM for its joint venture firm, Marelli Talbros Chassis Systems (MTCS). The contract spans eight years, starting from the fourth quarter of this fiscal year. It involves supplying suspension arms for both traditional internal combustion engine vehicles and modern electric vehicle platforms.
